0.title: The Light Wizzard in the Flesh - Science - Step 0

episode of.title: The Light Wizzard in the Flesh (TV Series 2010– )

0.plot: If Science is to be Real Science, it cannot be based on unproven Theories, so in the Trinary Universe, we will only consider Empirical Evidence as a basis for any explanation, and the Explanation cannot use Theories to explain it.

1.title: The Light Wizzard in the Flesh - Science - Step 1

episode of.title: The Light Wizzard in the Flesh (TV Series 2010– )

1.plot: Its Time to Vote for what Universe is Real, the Static or Dynamic Universe?

3.title: The Light Wizzard in the Flesh - Science - Step 2

episode of.title: The Light Wizzard in the Flesh (TV Series 2010– )

3.plot: Science has to be Defined as being Reality, not just some Theory that can be Proven or Disproven, so in Science we must use Empirical Evidence to prove things, and Theories prove nothing.

5.title: The Light Wizzard in the Flesh - Science - Step 3

episode of.title: The Light Wizzard in the Flesh (TV Series 2010– )

5.plot: A Theory is like an Opinion, everyone has one, and no one can agree on anything, so both of these are useless when it comes to Science, so I try to never give Opinions or Theories about anything, but Science is more then Facts, and has nothing to do with Religion, because Freewill is more Important and less confining, but in a World that is Ruled by Money, which is the Root of all Evil, and the Driving Force behind all Science, it seems Science is what yew Pay for, Yew only listen to those that have Money, so Money is the Only Science Yew know, so its no Surprise that...

0.title: The Light Wizzard in the Flesh - IAM - Step 0

episode of.title: The Light Wizzard in the Flesh (TV Series 2010– )

0.plot: His-Story of Wizards and the Science of the Trinary Universe from the Viewpoint of the Lightside, in Terms the Darkside can Understand Step by Step.

1.title: The Light Wizzard in the Flesh - IAM - Step 1

episode of.title: The Light Wizzard in the Flesh (TV Series 2010– )

1.plot: IAM talking about Angels, Demons and Ghost, and it seems yew all have more Demons then Angles in yewer Life.

2.title: The Dark Wizzard in the Flesh - IAM - Step -1

episode of.title: The Light Wizzard in the Flesh (TV Series 2010– )

2.plot: The Dark Wizzard tales His-Story about becoming a Disabled Gulf War Vet, and how it made me see the Darkside of Society, and this is how I view it from the Darkside.

3.title: The Light Wizzard in the Flesh - IAM - Step 2

episode of.title: The Light Wizzard in the Flesh (TV Series 2010– )

3.plot: Everyone thinks they know what Light and Dark is, some think they can see the Light, so its time to explain what side IAM on: Lightside or Darkside, because we must all chose a Side to be on, but in Reality, we all live in Shades of Grey.

4.title: The Light Wizzard in the Flesh - IAM - Step -2

episode of.title: The Light Wizzard in the Flesh (TV Series 2010– )

4.plot: The Dark Wizzard knows how the Darkside thinks, the Sheeple are in the Dark and do Dark things and think its in the Light, that Little Voice thinks that is who you are, but its just Meat, so its the Flesh, so its Darkside Emotions.

5.title: The Light Wizzard in the Flesh - IAM - Step 3

episode of.title: The Light Wizzard in the Flesh (TV Series 2010– )

5.plot: The Darkside denies the Light exist so they deny God Exist by saying God is just a Deity or Spirit, but lie about the Light of God being who IAM, and they have created a Secret Society to keep it a Secret.

6.title: The Light Wizzard in the Flesh - IAM - Step +1

episode of.title: The Light Wizzard in the Flesh (TV Series 2010– )

6.plot: To be in the Light, is to be without any Emotions, No Love, No Hate, and No Fear, but most of Yew Believe that its only Human to Have Emotions, when its a Fact its those Emotions that make yew act Like Animals.

7.title: The Light Wizzard in the Flesh - IAM - Step +2

episode of.title: The Light Wizzard in the Flesh (TV Series 2010– )

7.plot: The Lightside never understands how to communicate with the Darkside, because there is no way for the Lightside to communicate concepts that do not exist in the Darkness, so its here where we begins.

8.title: The Light Wizzard in the Flesh - IAM - Step +3

episode of.title: The Light Wizzard in the Flesh (TV Series 2010– )

8.plot: Every Step I take into the Light, the Deeper into the Darkness I must go to get their, because the Darkside never sees the Light, nor does the Darkside see its Evil deeds, which are just backward Spells of the way the Light Lives.

9.title: The Light Wizzard in the Flesh - IAM - Step 2

episode of.title: The Light Wizzard in the Flesh (TV Series 2010– )

9.plot: Most of the Great Wizards of all time have been Ashkenazi with Autism and high IQ's, so its no wonder they all see the Darkness is not the Light, so they know how the Universe works, only Yew Lie about it.

10.title: The Light Wizzard in the Flesh - IAM - Step -4

episode of.title: The Light Wizzard in the Flesh (TV Series 2010– )

10.plot: Neurotypicals make fun of Wizards because they have no idea who we are, they make fun of people with Autism and call them Retarded, when its not uncommon for people with Autism to have an IQ of 180 in the 3rd Grade.

11.title: The Light Wizzard in the Flesh - IAM - Step 5

episode of.title: The Light Wizzard in the Flesh (TV Series 2010– )

11.plot: Reality is Not what Really happened, its just the way History Recorded it as happening, and everyone knows that, but few know the Difference, because its only what yew choice to believe that even matters to yew.

13.title: The Dark Wizzard in the Flesh - IAM - Step -5

episode of.title: The Light Wizzard in the Flesh (TV Series 2010– )

13.plot: The way we view Societies is the way we view Reality, but the way we view the History of Societies is based on ignorance, since our Society is not as advanced as the Society that built the Pyramids.

14.title: The Light Wizzard in the Flesh - IAM - Step 6

episode of.title: The Light Wizzard in the Flesh (TV Series 2010– )

14.plot: Time to own up to all my Actions, even if those Actions where only in my Dreams, and my Dreams and Reality are just Levels of Consciousness, because the Lines between the Lightside and the Darkside are Blurry at best.

0.title: The Light Wizzard in the Flesh - Emotions - Step 0

episode of.title: The Light Wizzard in the Flesh (TV Series 2010– )

0.plot: Introduction to His-Story of Wizards and the Science of the Universe in Terms the Darkside can Understand Step by Step, Emotions of an Animal and the Light of God in one Body of Flesh.

1.title: The Light Wizzard in the Flesh - Emotions - Step 1

episode of.title: The Light Wizzard in the Flesh (TV Series 2010– )

1.plot: First we have to agree upon what Emotions are, because most people take the word for granted, and think they know what Emotions are, they have names for every Emotion they can think of, so lets look at a few, and see where this takes us.

0.title: The Light Wizzard in the Flesh - Universe - Step 0

episode of.title: The Light Wizzard in the Flesh (TV Series 2010– )

0.plot: Science is not Real Science unless it can be proven to be Real, and that is what this Universe is all about, proving that Reality is Real only if the Science that Explains it is real.

1.title: The Light Wizzard in the Flesh - Universe - Step 1

episode of.title: The Light Wizzard in the Flesh (TV Series 2010– )

1.plot: The Universe is a pretty scary place to live for Sheep, so as Sheep Dog, its my job to put them right at ease, so I tale them like it is, Danger.

0.title: The Light Wizzard in the Flesh - Dimensions - Step 0

episode of.title: The Light Wizzard in the Flesh (TV Series 2010– )

0.plot: Science starts when you define how everything in the Universe works, that starts at the subatomic Level and is defined in the Dimensions of Space.

0.title: The Light Wizzard in the Flesh - Game - Step 0

episode of.title: The Light Wizzard in the Flesh (TV Series 2010– )

0.plot: People like to Play Games, the Religious play a Game called God is not a Physically Real, and the Lord is their Shepard, so this is Game Sheeple play, while others Worship Money with In God We Trust Engraven on it, this is the Game.

0.title: The Light Wizzard in the Flesh - Road Map - Step 0

episode of.title: The Light Wizzard in the Flesh (TV Series 2010– )

0.plot: This Series will detail were this whole Series is going so not one gets Lost on the way to the Trinary Universe.

0.title: The Light Wizzard in the Flesh - Rant - Step 0

episode of.title: The Light Wizzard in the Flesh (TV Series 2010– )

0.plot: Rants are something that People view differently, but when I was a Child I thought it was a creature that was half Rat and half Ant, so it was a strange creature, and it would get on peoples back till they got it off.

1.title: The Light Wizzard in the Flesh - Rant - Child Murder - Step 0.1

episode of.title: The Light Wizzard in the Flesh (TV Series 2010– )

1.plot: New Scientific Research Proves that 99.9% of all Children Murdered in the Universe is Perpetrated by Females, so its not the Wars of Men that only cut down on the Population of, so the Dog Barks the Sheep are not safe.

2.title: The Light Wizzard in the Flesh - Rant - Guitar Wizard - Step 0.2

episode of.title: The Light Wizzard in the Flesh (TV Series 2010– )

2.plot: How a Wizard Plays Guitar is an Exact Science, in this Series I will try to show yew how I played each of the Guitar Instrumentals, Step by Step we learn to Play the Music for the Light.

0.title: The Light Wizzard in the Flesh - Sanctuary - Step 0

episode of.title: The Light Wizzard in the Flesh (TV Series 2010– )

0.plot: Sanctuary is just a word, so to define what Sanctuary means, we must define it in a way that its understandable, so this is where we start, I wrote a book called The Principles of a Trinary Sanctuary, this is that Story.

0.title: The Light Wizzard in the Flesh - Trinary Energy - Step 0

episode of.title: The Light Wizzard in the Flesh (TV Series 2010– )

0.plot: Sir Isaac Newton proved that the Light of God physically exist and Trinity described it, as Science not Religion, because Christ was inserted into the Bible so that God would not Physically Exist and Trinary Energy is the Light of God.

1.title: The Light Wizzard in the Flesh - HisStory - Step 1

episode of.title: The Light Wizzard in the Flesh (TV Series 2010– )

1.plot: The Legend of the Light Wizzard began on a Mountain top, in a period of Time that yew might at first have a hard time grasping, and its the Legend that people get confused about when they are talking about Wizards.

0.title: The Light Wizzard in the Flesh - Society - Step 0

episode of.title: The Light Wizzard in the Flesh (TV Series 2010– )

0.plot: Society is what yew pay for, so its all about Money, but to create an Advanced Society, you will have to get rid of all its Rulers: No Money, No Laws, Rules and Regulations, No Religion, and that is just the Start of an Advanced Society.

0.title: The Light Wizzard in the Flesh - JustUs - Step 0

episode of.title: The Light Wizzard in the Flesh (TV Series 2010– )

0.plot: JustUs is the concept that there is no Justice, because Justice is all about Money and Banks that the own the World, so this is JustUS.

imdb.plot outline: The Light Wizzard in the Flesh is His-Story of how this Light Wizzard comes to him in his Dreams and explains how the Universe works at the Subatomic Level using this White Noise that his Parents told him was the Light of God, he gets into trouble staring at this Light throughout his life, Adults would always tell him that he was wrong about how the Universe works, telling him he is no Einstein, even though his IQ is much higher then Einsteins in the 3rd Grade, so he stops talking about the Wizzards because he becomes bored with Sheeple telling him he would understand when he grows up, so he Grows up and becomes a Staff Sergeant in the United States Air Force, he was an F-111 Computer Test Station Technician and was awarded a Meritorious medal for bringing the F-111 program in a year ahead of time with a 30% improvement to the system, so that it could be used in the Gulf War, after the Gulf War, he start to come down with Gulf War Syndrome, even though the Military tells him he does not have it, he cross trained into Air Rescue and Special Operations as a Helicopter Crew Chief, after being medically retired for Symptoms of Gulf War Syndrome and getting divorced at the same time, he decided to start a website talking about what happened, then in 2000 his father calls him a month before he dies and tells him an old family secret: you are an Ashkenazi who was diagnosed with Autism and a high IQ in the 3rd grade, and then the Dreams became more intense and he could not longer sleep, suffering from a rare sleep disorder he has no REM sleep, and he can no longer tell the difference between dreams and what happened, so he writes a Series to explain all this, on the way he got his PhD in Physics, proving that the Light of God Isaac Newton talked about as being the Force in all his Equations, is now Science in the Book "The Principles of the Trinary Universe", so this is His-Story.
imdb.title: The Light Wizzard in the Flesh
akas: The Light Wizzard in the Flesh (United States)
plot: His-Story about growing up in a World of Stupid People he calls Sheeple, a childhood Dream about this Wizzard that tales him how the Universe works, becoming a Sheep Dog, he tales his-story to the Sheep thru the White Wizard.::Jeffrey Scott Flesher

_The Light Wizzard in the Flesh_ (qv) is His-Story of how this Light Wizzard comes to him in his Dreams and explains how the Universe works at the Subatomic Level using this White Noise that his Parents told him was the Light of God, he gets into trouble staring at this Light throughout his life, Adults would always tell him that he was wrong about how the Universe works, telling him he is no Einstein, even though his IQ is much higher then Einsteins in the 3rd Grade, so he stops talking about the Wizzards because he becomes bored with Sheeple telling him he would understand when he grows up, so he Grows up and becomes a Staff Sergeant in the United States Air Force, he was an F-111 Computer Test Station Technician and was awarded a Meritorious medal for bringing the F-111 program in a year ahead of time with a 30% improvement to the system, so that it could be used in the Gulf War, after the Gulf War, he start to come down with Gulf War Syndrome, even though the Military tells him he does not have it, he cross trained into Air Rescue and Special Operations as a Helicopter Crew Chief, after being medically retired for Symptoms of Gulf War Syndrome and getting divorced at the same time, he decided to start a website talking about what happened, then in 2000 his father calls him a month before he dies and tells him an old family secret: you are an Ashkenazi who was diagnosed with Autism and a high IQ in the 3rd grade, and then the Dreams became more intense and he could not longer sleep, suffering from a rare sleep disorder he has no REM sleep, and he can no longer tell the difference between dreams and what happened, so he writes a Series to explain all this, on the way he got his PhD in Physics, proving that the Light of God Isaac Newton talked about as being the Force in all his Equations, is now Science in the Book "The Principles of the Trinary Universe", so this is His-Story.::Jeffrey Scott Flesher
